mutants.code:
from operator import mul
from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from collections import Counter

def calculate_permutations_and_extremes(arr):
    total_permutations = factorial(len(arr)) / reduce(mul, list(map(factorial, list(Counter(arr).values()))))
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
    min_value = int(''.join(sorted_arr))
    max_value = int(''.join(sorted_arr[::-1]))
    return [total_permutations, min_value, max_value]

def calculate_permutations_and_extremes(arr):

    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)

    return [total_permutations, min_value, max_value]

from operator import mul
from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from collections import Counter

def calculate_permutations_and_extremes(arr):
    total_permutations = factorial(len(arr)) // reduce(mul, list(map(factorial, list(Counter(arr).values()))))
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
    min_value = int('MUTATED'.join(sorted_arr))
    max_value = int(''.join(sorted_arr[::-1]))
    return [total_permutations, min_value, max_value]

from operator import mul
from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from collections import Counter

def calculate_permutations_and_extremes(arr):
    total_permutations = factorial(len(arr)) // reduce(mul, list(map(factorial, list(Counter(arr).values()))))
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)

    max_value = int(''.join(sorted_arr[::--1]))
    return [total_permutations, min_value, max_value]
